Author: BrokenCoffeeF
Text: Swollen parotid glands. They are your largest salivary glands and are found on each cheek. Bulimics tend to have swollen parotids, especially if constantly purging, and it takes some time for the effect to disappear; in very severe cases, it may not ever (such as this [case report of a 32 year old who had been bulimic for 14 years](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5878158/) ).
